title: Fresh Mac install issues
body:
I have a new Macbook Pro running the latest version of Mac OS (10.12.2).   I downloaded the game from the LoL website, opened the .dmg file and copied the launcher to the applications folder.  I launch the game from the applications folder (not the dock) and I see the LoL splash screen and then nothing.  Sometimes I get the white dot but sometimes I do not.  I checked the activity monitor and I see the UserKernel is not responding.  I have tried sitting there at that screen for 15+ minutes and nothing changes.  The game will not open.  I also tried downloading a fresh copy of the game and that had no effect.  I get the same behavior.  I added an exception to the apple firewall for LoL to allow all incoming connections but there was no change.  I also tried running as root and this is what I got:

> Craigs-MacBook-Pro:Applications craig$ sudo League\ of\ Legends.app/
> Password:
> sudo: League of Legends.app/: command not found
> Craigs-MacBook-Pro:Applications craig$ sudo /Applications/League\ of\ Legends.app/Contents/MacOS/RiotMacContainer
> Craigs-MacBook-Pro:Applications craig$ 2017-01-01 13:35:28.566 UserKernel[1656:125043] WARNING: nextEventMatchingMask should only be called from the Main Thread! This will throw an exception in the future.
> (0xa53391c0): ALWAYS| int Riot::RADS::RiotClientMiniLauncher::Main(): Riot Application Distribution System (c) 2010 Riot Games (version 3.20.0.204)
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| ErrorPtr Riot::RADS::Patching::::CalculateWorkStep(const Riot::RADS::Patching::ProductSettings &, const RadsVersion, const Common::ReleaseManifest &, const std::vector > &, Common::PatchManifest *, Common::ReleaseManifest *, std::vector &, std::vector &, std::vector &, std::vector &, std::vector &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Starting timing
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| ErrorPtr Riot::RADS::Patching::::CalculateWorkStep(const Riot::RADS::Patching::ProductSettings &, const RadsVersion, const Common::ReleaseManifest &, const std::vector > &, Common::PatchManifest *, Common::ReleaseManifest *, std::vector &, std::vector &, std::vector &, std::vector &, std::vector &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Completed timing in 0.0 sec
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| RIOT_HRESULT Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::CopyFilesStep(const std::vector &, const Riot::RADS::Patching::ProductSettings &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Starting timing
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| RIOT_HRESULT Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::CopyFilesStep(const std::vector &, const Riot::RADS::Patching::ProductSettings &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Completed timing in 0.0 sec
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| ErrorPtr Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::DeleteFilesFromArchivesStep(const std::vector &, const std::string &, const std::string &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Starting timing
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| ErrorPtr Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::DeleteFilesFromArchivesStep(const std::vector &, const std::string &, const std::string &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Completed timing in 0.0 sec
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| ErrorPtr Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::ArchiveFilesStep(const std::vector &, std::vector &, const std::string &, const std::string &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Starting timing
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| RIOT_HRESULT Riot::RADS::Patching::DeleteFiles(const std::vector &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Starting timing
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| RIOT_HRESULT Riot::RADS::Patching::DeleteFiles(const std::vector &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Completed timing in 0.0 sec
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| ErrorPtr Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::ArchiveFilesStep(const std::vector &, std::vector &, const std::string &, const std::string &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Completed timing in 0.0 sec
> (0xb0676000): ALWAYS| ErrorPtr Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::DownloadFilesStep(const std::vector &, const std::string &, const Common::ReleaseManifest &, Patching::IRemoteFileServer &, Riot::RADS::Patching::AutoUpdateProgress &): Starting timing
> 2017-01-01 13:35:55.613 LoLLauncher[1658:125616] WARNING: nextEventMatchingMask should only be called from the Main Thread! This will throw an exception in the future.
> Craigs-MacBook-Pro:Applications craig$

Any thoughts on how to get the game to run?

replies.body: There might be an issue that's failing to open up the client after leaving the patcher.  I recommend using the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, but making sure to select Mac options.  Let me know if you have any questions!
